title: So ashe Q is a 4s duration steroid with a 18s cd...
body:
AND you still need the 5 stack thing to get the good part of it...I know ashe isnt supposed THE damage dealing adc but doesnt this look a bit weak?I mean just compare to every other adc steroid lol, the cd should scale down a bit with ranks or the duration needs to go up.

Also we need to give cait a steroid too now >.>, i mean not really just gotta buff her base as and passive back.
